verses.verse: Then Job <S%H347><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
How long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H575><s%> will ye vex <S%H3013><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> and break me in pieces <S%H1792><s%> with words? <S%H4405><s%>
These <S%H2088><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> have ye reproached <S%H3637><s%> me: ye are not <S%H3808><s%> ashamed <S%H954><s%> that ye make yourselves strange <S%H1970><s%> to me.
And <S%H637><s%> be it indeed <S%H551><s%> that I have erred, <S%H7686><s%> mine error <S%H4879><s%> remaineth <S%H3885><s%> with <S%H854><s%> myself.
If <S%H518><s%> indeed <S%H551><s%> ye will magnify <S%H1431><s%> yourselves against <S%H5921><s%> me, and plead <S%H3198><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me my reproach: <S%H2781><s%>
Know <S%H3045><s%> now <S%H645><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H433><s%> hath overthrown <S%H5791><s%> me, and hath compassed <S%H5362><s%> <S%H5921><s%> me with his net. <S%H4685><s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I cry out <S%H6817><s%> of wrong, <S%H2555><s%> but I am not <S%H3808><s%> heard: <S%H6030><s%> I cry aloud, <S%H7768><s%> but there is no <S%H369><s%> judgment. <S%H4941><s%>
He hath fenced up <S%H1443><s%> my way <S%H734><s%> that I cannot <S%H3808><s%> pass, <S%H5674><s%> and he hath set <S%H7760><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> my paths. <S%H5410><s%>
He hath stripped me of <S%H6584><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> my glory, <S%H3519><s%> and taken <S%H5493><s%> the crown <S%H5850><s%> from my head. <S%H7218><s%>
He hath destroyed <S%H5422><s%> me on every side, <S%H5439><s%> and I am gone: <S%H1980><s%> and mine hope <S%H8615><s%> hath he removed <S%H5265><s%> like a tree. <S%H6086><s%>
He hath also kindled <S%H2734><s%> his wrath <S%H639><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, and he counteth <S%H2803><s%> me unto him as one of his enemies. <S%H6862><s%>

His troops <S%H1416><s%> come <S%H935><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> and raise up <S%H5549><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, and encamp <S%H2583><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> my tabernacle. <S%H168><s%>
He hath put my brethren far <S%H7368><s%> <S%H251><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> me, and mine acquaintance <S%H3045><s%> are verily <S%H389><s%> estranged <S%H2114><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> me.
My kinsfolk <S%H7138><s%> have failed, <S%H2308><s%> and my familiar friends <S%H3045><s%> have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> me.

They that dwell <S%H1481><s%> in mine house, <S%H1004><s%> and my maids, <S%H519><s%> count <S%H2803><s%> me for a stranger: <S%H2114><s%> I am <S%H1961><s%> an alien <S%H5237><s%> in their sight. <S%H5869><s%>
I called <S%H7121><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> and he gave me no <S%H3808><s%> answer; <S%H6030><s%> I entreated <S%H2603><s%> him with <S%H1119><s%> my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
My breath <S%H7307><s%> is strange <S%H2114><s%> to my wife, <S%H802><s%> though I entreated <S%H2603><s%> for the children's <S%H1121><s%> sake of mine own body. <S%H990><s%>
Yea, <S%H1571><s%> young children <S%H5759><s%> despised <S%H3988><s%> me; I arose, <S%H6965><s%> and they spoke <S%H1696><s%> against me.
All <S%H3605><s%> my inward <S%H5475><s%> friends <S%H4962><s%> abhorred <S%H8581><s%> me: and they whom <S%H2088><s%> I loved <S%H157><s%> are turned <S%H2015><s%> against me.
My bone <S%H6106><s%> cleaveth <S%H1692><s%> to my skin <S%H5785><s%> and to my flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and I am escaped <S%H4422><s%> with the skin <S%H5785><s%> of my teeth. <S%H8127><s%>

Have pity upon <S%H2603><s%> me, have pity upon <S%H2603><s%> me, O ye <S%H859><s%> my friends; <S%H7453><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of God <S%H433><s%> hath touched <S%H5060><s%> me.
Why <S%H4100><s%> do ye persecute <S%H7291><s%> me as <S%H3644><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> and are not <S%H3808><s%> satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with my flesh? <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1320><s%>
Oh that <S%H4310><s%> my words <S%H4405><s%> were <S%H5414><s%> now <S%H645><s%> written! <S%H3789><s%> oh that <S%H4310><s%> they were <S%H5414><s%> printed <S%H2710><s%> in a book! <S%H5612><s%>
That they were graven <S%H2672><s%> with an iron <S%H1270><s%> pen <S%H5842><s%> and lead <S%H5777><s%> in the rock <S%H6697><s%> forever! <S%H5703><s%>

For I <S%H589><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> that my redeemer <S%H1350><s%> liveth, <S%H2416><s%> and that he shall stand <S%H6965><s%> at the latter <S%H314><s%> day upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth: <S%H6083><s%>
And though after <S%H310><s%> my skin <S%H5785><s%> worms destroy <S%H5362><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> body, yet in my flesh <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1320><s%> shall I see <S%H2372><s%> God: <S%H433><s%>

Whom <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> shall see <S%H2372><s%> for myself, and mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall behold, <S%H7200><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> another; <S%H2114><s%> though my reins <S%H3629><s%> be consumed <S%H3615><s%> within <S%H2436><s%> me.
But <S%H3588><s%> ye should say, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> persecute <S%H7291><s%> we him, seeing the root <S%H8328><s%> of the matter <S%H1697><s%> is found <S%H4672><s%> in me?

Be ye afraid <S%H1481><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the sword: <S%H2719><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> wrath <S%H2534><s%> bringeth the punishments <S%H5771><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> ye may know <S%H3045><s%> there is a judgment. <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1779><s%>
